item.description:
April is another WINGS Program with Jim Adams....

http://www.suttonjame...

This one is with Jamie Buffington from Sutton James Insurance company.
Jamie will be there to answer any questions you may have on your insurance.
Bring your questions and let's see what's really covered or, more importantly, what's not!

"James Buffington is one of our senior brokers, and holds a B.S. in Aviation Management and Flight Operations from Daniel Webster College. Jamie is a licensed Private Pilot with Single Engine Instrument and Sea ratings and has a passion for flying. Prior to joining Sutton James, Jamie gained experience in the corporate aviation industry as a dispatcher for a corporate flight department. Jamie is a member of our Robinson Helicopter Insurance Program team and handles a wide array of insurance for his clients ranging from fixed and rotor wing aircraft to flight schools and commercial operators."

Also, with a little coaxing, maybe we can get Jim Adams to give us the updated version of the new Wings Program. How it works and what's it all about. I've heard good things about this one! Finally.


OSH Raffle Tickets will be on sale.... We'll pick up some discussions on our upcoming events as well..

Thanks to Program coordinator Jim Bisson aka Diamond Jim, for putting this together for us with Jim Adams.


As always, Fly Often and Fly Safe.
See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 April Meetup
